H0.text: What is the principal charity for single parent families in the UK. Gingerbread

H1.text: What is the principal charity for single parent families in the UK. Barnardo's

H2.text: What is the principal charity for single parent families in the UK. One Parent Families

H3.text: What is the principal charity for single parent families in the UK. Pierniki

A4.text: Gingerbread describes itself as the leading charity working with single-parent families across England and Wales.

A5.text: The charity provides information and practical support to single parents.
